name: Armed & Delirious
storyline: Armed & Delirious tells a surrealist story about the Crotony family, who torture animals. The family is targeted by the Great Rabbit, one of their escaped captives, who kidnaps them and steals Granny Crotony's cookbook. Granny then seeks to defeat the Great Rabbit, rescue her family and retrieve her cookbook.
summary: Armed and Delirious is a surrealist point-and-click adventure game in the tradition of the old Lucasarts style. The game includes a claymation art style and various puzzles.
